topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556e95e363687252135f1d00#post_556e95e363687252135f1d00
Honestly I found the one about Van Gogh to be the most touching, cause Van Gogh was the best artist of all time and everyone during his life thought his art was rubbish.  The sad thing is that even today good arts are completely ignored by people.  There was a while back a world class musician playing at a train station as a test and everyone ignored him.

There could be a Van Gogh or a Beethoven of our era and we wouldn't even know they exist because nobody cares.  For all we know the greatest artist of all time exists today and is stuck flipping burgers at mcdonalds simply because nobody cares.

Van Gogh died alone and penniless because people just don't care.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
